entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
